title: I need to have clarity on the radar motion sense feature is it will support any of Middle East Asia
content:
Hi, I live in the United Arab Emirates (U.A.E)  and I am interested to buy the Pixel 4 XL. Google doesn't sell the pixel phone in Middle East Asia and I am planning to buy one from the USA.
I need to have clarity on the radar motion sense feature is it will support any of Middle East Asia or not.
